vote.title: Authorize a design-build services contract with Azteca Enterprises, Inc. LLC to provide pre-design, pre-construction services, architectural, and engineering design, and construction services for the Reverchon Ballpark Restoration and Improvements Project located at 3505 Maple Avenue - Not to exceed $4,964,832.00 - Financing: Capital Gifts, Donation, and Development Fund
